title: Estadio Olímpico Universitario José Reyes Baeza
text: The Estadio Olímpico Universitario is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Chihuahua%20City">Chihuahua</a>, <a href="Chihuahua%20%28state%29">Chihuahua</a>, <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a>, <a href="American%20football">American football</a> and <a href="concerts">concerts</a>. The stadium holds 22,000 people.
